Failure summary completed. Defect identified and fixed (SCRUM-52). CLI invalid-board path now hard-fails as expected.
Checklist command set and expected outputs completed in docs/V0_1_ACCEPTANCE_CHECKLIST.md and validated with real runs across ESP32/STM32/RP2040/AVR.
